content.rendered:
Directed by Molly McGlynn. Declan Lowney. Anu Valia.

Written by Amanda Rosenberg. Craig Rowin. Corinne Stikeman. M.O. Walsh. David West Read.

Cast Crystal Fox (Izzy 1). Djouliet Amara (Trina 1). Patrick Kerr. Elizabeth Hunter (Savannah). Aaron Roman Weiner (Beau Kovac). Gillian Rabin (Lydia). Haroon Khan (Raymond). Kalyn Hardman (Rita). Susan Savoie (Martha). Tim Perez-Ross (Coach Eagleson). Emily Topper (Hawaii). Rory Keane (Glen). Noor Naghmi (Mr. Malik). Schelle Purcell (Rose). Andrew Dicostanzo (Tucker). Lynne Ashe (Sheila). Raven Lovette (Extra). Josh Segarra (Giorgio). Chris O’Dowd (Dusty). Gabrielle Dennis (Cass). Damon Gupton (Father Rueben). Jim Meskimen (Cary Hubbard). Cocoa Brown (Principal Pat). Sammy Fourlas (Jacob). Carrie Barrett (Dr. Woods). Christopher Cocke (Pedestrian). Jontavious Johnson (Axel). Christian Adam (Trevor). Iona Leighton (Ellen). Kim Alvarez-Cazzetto (Vicky). Sam Zheng (Darrell (Mr. Dusty’s Student) (uncredited) unknow)

Producers Matthew Spiegel. Sarah Walker. Richard J. Anobile. Lauren Heath. David West Read. Bill Bost. David Ellison. Dana Goldberg. Miky Lee. Hyun Park.

Production Apple Studios. Skydance Television. Studio Dragon.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status On Going (2023–)
